Game data[edit]

Configuration file(s) location[edit]

System Location
Windows HKEY_CURRENT_USER\SOFTWARE\Ghost Town Games\Overcooked\
Steam Play (Linux) <Steam-folder>/steamapps/compatdata/448510/pfx/[Note 2]

Save game data location[edit]

System Location
Windows %USERPROFILE%\AppData\LocalLow\Ghost Town Games\Overcooked\*.save
Steam Play (Linux) <Steam-folder>/steamapps/compatdata/448510/pfx/[Note 2]

System requirements[edit]

Windows
Minimum
Operating system (OS) 7
Processor (CPU) Dual Core 2.4 GHz
System memory (RAM) 2 GB
Hard disk drive (HDD) 750 MB
Video card (GPU) Intel HD Graphics 4400
Nvidia GeForce 8800 GT
AMD Radeon HD 6850
DirectX 11 compatible

Notes

  1. ↑ Unity engine build: 5.5.0p1[1]
  2. ↑ 2.0 2.1 File/folder structure within this directory reflects the path(s) listed for Windows and/or Steam game data (use Wine regedit to access Windows registry paths). Games with Steam Cloud support may store data in ~/.steam/steam/userdata/<user-id>/448510/ in addition to or instead of this directory. The app ID (448510) may differ in some cases. Treat backslashes as forward slashes. See the glossary page for details.
